mapper.select: SELECT basic_situation.username, basic_situation.bsscore, learning_ability.lascore, reputation.rescore, reward_punishment.rpscore, trust_worthiness.twscore FROM basic_situation INNER JOIN learning_ability ON basic_situation.username = learning_ability.username INNER JOIN reputation ON basic_situation.username = reputation.username INNER JOIN reward_punishment ON basic_situation.username = reward_punishment.username INNER JOIN trust_worthiness ON basic_situation.username = trust_worthiness.username LIMIT #{start},#{size}
